sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FaCogs, FaCircle } from 'react-icons/fa'; function ChatHeader({ avatar, username, handleShowRoomInfo, handleLogout, showRoomInfo, roomInfo, handleDeleteMember, selectedChatId }) { return (
{username}
{showRoomInfo || roomInfo && (

Room Name: {roomInfo.room_name}

Members:

      {roomInfo.list_member.map(member => (
    • {member.username} - {member.email}
      • ))}
)}
); } export default ChatHeader;
